sentence: First-time debaters included Kandiss Taylor, an educator; Catherine Davis, a civil rights advocate; and Tom Williams, a former Robins Air Force Base employee.
title: Ohio Republicans campaign in Trump's shadow ahead of Tuesday's primary.
